name: Hash Brown and Pork Chop Casserole
author: Shelli
summary: If homey casseroles are your thing, this dish is for you! Rich and creamy its sure to satisfy!
ingredients: 1 (2 pound) package frozen hash brown potatoes
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of celery soup
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
In a large skillet over medium high heat, brown pork chops on both sides and set aside
In a large bowl, combine the sour cream, soup and milk
Add the hash browns and chopped onion; stir to coat
Place mixture in a 13x9-inch baking dish and sprinkle the cheese over the top
Place the browned pork chops on top
Bake in the preheated oven for 50 minutes or until the potatoes are heated through and pork chops are fully cooked
